title: Feeders and leavers everywhere in ranked..
body: My thought are that Rito needs to do something about feeders at least,cause it's not fun losing your Ranked games,that could have been won,because some kid decides to go feed the enemy...so pls dont just ban these players for days and stuff,it's useless,and they are everywhere like thrash...so instead,ban them permanently...and afk players for days maybe,maybe it isn't their fault they left,maybe it's the internet or something...:) ty for reading and noticing :) i just had it and had to let things out...

replies.body: i dont know how many time i saw this kind of post form last 3 years and until now Riot didnt nothing, they are playing as deaf and blind ppl. i can see that trash appear more day by day. but what Riot is doing now is create a new skin to get money, that's it. They just saw us as trashers is crying. Never hear anything about they will make game play better. This game is bunch of shiit players who just wanna have fun and troll in other's game.
I agree that feeding players need to be insta permabanned
I was just playing bad though, and you sat under tower using no abilities flaming me all game, where is the fun in that

> [{quoted}](name=Itankyou,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=L9mehuWs,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-09-05T19:41:18.714+0000)
>
> I was just playing bad though, and you sat under tower using no abilities flaming me all game, where is the fun in that

Why did you reply to my comment?
